column5: I've been invited there for a weekend by a friend. Does anyone have any suggestions / fishing tips?
Only thing I can suggest is not to drill a hole in Nevil Knupp's outdoor rink !

This lake is on my hit list. Can anyone comment on public access to fishing grounds? I found some info from others telling stories "of way back" which could end up in trespassing in these modern times.
Wow it look like this is not a popular lake. I'll give it a go this weekend hopefully I can find a couple.
When I lived in Port Carling many moons ago, we fished it all the time for whities. Don't know about these days....

When I lived in Port Carling many moons ago, we fished it all the time for whities. Don't know about these days.... Port Carling a good way from Kinmount!!  Ive fished Crystal a couple times in the summer for Bass but never in the winter...i assume the deep basins will have some lakers in them!
Easy access to the lake but with no parking signs along the road... I guess you have to know someone or park where legal and sled to there
Just go into town, it has that name for a reason! No kidding, I know a story.
suddenly I want to get on  Crystal and drill a couple  holes
Port Carling a good way from Kinmount!!    Okay
